none.name: No Color Correction
none.description: Apply no color effects - keep original video colors

colors_medium.name: Colors - Medium
colors_medium.description: Balanced color enhancement with moderate saturation boost

hdr_vivid_colors.name: HDR - Vivid Colors
hdr_vivid_colors.description: High dynamic range look with vivid, saturated colors for vibrant visuals

colors_high.name: Colors - High
colors_high.description: Intense color enhancement with high saturation for bold, vibrant videos

colors_low.name: Colors - Low
colors_low.description: Subtle color enhancement with gentle saturation boost

bright_areas.name: Bright Areas Enhanced
bright_areas.description: Enhances highlights and bright areas for better visibility

dark_areas.name: Dark Areas Enhanced
dark_areas.description: Enhances shadows and dark areas for better detail visibility

sharpness_high.name: Sharpness - High
sharpness_high.description: Maximum sharpness and clarity for crisp, detailed videos

sharpness_low.name: Sharpness - Low
sharpness_low.description: Subtle sharpness enhancement for natural-looking detail boost

sharpness_medium.name: Sharpness - Medium
sharpness_medium.description: Balanced sharpness enhancement for improved detail without artifacts
